title: Divisional Round Red Challenge Flag Picks & Willie McGinest on Chargers vs Patriots
itunes:title: Divisional Round Red Challenge Flag Picks & Willie McGinest on Chargers vs Patriots
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined in Studio 66 by Move The Sticks host Bucky Brooks to break down the Divisional round playoff match ups! Shek and Bucky start up with their Red Challenge Flag picks for Saturday and Sunday's games - where they disagreed on every pick (3:15). As always, Shek must bring up the Pittsburgh Steelers so he asks Bucky if Antonio Brown will be a member of the Steelers in 2019 (45:40). Next, Willie McGinest joins the show to give his take on the showdown in Foxboro between the Los Angeles Chargers and the New England Patriots (52:21). They wrap up the show with some talk about Josh McDaniels not looking for a head coaching job (1:14:50) and if Freddie Kitchen was a good hire by the Browns (1:19:55).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
